answers.answer: Alot depends on your family history. I had the normal bloodwork done at 10 weeks checking for chromosomal stuff plus iron lvls and all of that stuff., but because I am considered high risk I had to have more bloodwork done last week to test clotting factors and also had to have early gestational diabetes screening. So i think of you arent high risk then initially you dont have to have a lot of bloodwork done, but I could be wrong.
At my 12 week appt I had 12 vials taken lolThey did all my levels and panoramaDid a Pap smear and std testI just wanted to get that part over with
The last blood tests I had done were at 8 weeks. I'm due in for quad screen next week. I'm due 12 July.
It's more test doctors sometimes don't say what they are doing. Always ask
Just had blood tests done so far one at 11 weeks and one at 13 weeks xx

question: So what tests have you July mommies have gotten done? Im 14weeks and all they took was blood from me when I first went to the doc and I was 6 weeks.. Im just scared I should be getting a lot more things done.
title: Tests
